title: Create new VALID test case, no preexisting test cases
description: With no prior existing test cases, create a new test case with valid inputs
expected_result: Test case is created with input data and card with test case is visible

test_steps.value: GIVEN Im on the Test cases page
WHEN I click `New Test case`
AND I input some valid data in all of the offered fields
AND I click `Submit` button
THEN I Expect the new test case to be created
AND I expect the data to match what was previously entered

title: Create a new VALID test case, with some preexisting test cases
description: With already existing test cases, create a new test case with valid inputs
expected_result: Test case is created with input data, card with test case is visible and existing tests remain the same

test_steps.value: GIVEN Im on the Test cases page, with some existing test cases being there
WHEN I click `New Test case`
AND I input some valid data in all of the offered fields
AND I click `Submit` button
THEN I Expect the new test case to be created
AND I expect the data to match what was previously entered
AND I expect the existing test cases to be unaltered

title: Create a new VALID test case with a `Title` that already exists
description: With already existing test cases, create a new test case with a `Title` that is a duplicate of some other existing test case

test_steps.value: GIVEN Im on the Test cases page, with some existing test cases being there
WHEN I click `New Test case`
AND i input a `Title` that already exists on another Test Case
AND I input some valid data in all of the other offered fields
AND I click `Submit` button
THEN i expect a validation message to pop-up telling me that the title already exists
AND the test case shouldn't be created

title: Create new VALID test case with multiple test steps
description: Create a test case containing multiple test steps
expected_result: Test case is created with input data and card with test case is visible

test_steps.value: GIVEN Im on the Test cases page
WHEN I click `New Test case`
AND I input some valid data in all of the offered fields
AND I click on the `Add test step` button multiple times
AND I input valid data in the new `Test step` fields
AND I click `Submit` button
THEN I Expect the new test case to be created
AND I expect the data to match what was previously entered

title: Edit existing test case
description: Edit an existing test case with valid data
expected_result: The existing test case data is changed

test_steps.value: GIVEN Im on the Test cases page
AND There is an existing test case
WHEN I click on the test case card
AND I am taken to the edit test case form
AND I enter new data in all the fields
AND I click `Submit` button
THEN I Expect the existing test case to be updated
AND I expect the data to match the inputs in the update form

title: Delete existing test case
description: An existing test case is deleted
expected_result: The test case no longer exists

test_steps.value: GIVEN Im on the Test cases page
AND There is an existing test case
WHEN I click on the test case card
AND I am taken to the edit test case form
AND I Click the delete test case button on the upper right
AND I click `Remove` in the confirmation pop-up
THEN I expect to be redirected to the test cases page
AND I expect the deleted test case to no longer appear
